description:
Formed in 2014, the band’s sound grew organically — unhurried, unboxed, and
deeply human. Each song carries traces of their travels, their reflections,
and their belief that difference can be unifying. With poetic songwriting and
simple yet stirring compositions, The Tapi Project invites listeners to flow
with them — to drift, to feel, and to rise.
name: Windmills Music Night - The Tapi Project

performer.description: The Tapi Project returns to Windmills Craftworks as part of their Ud Jayega Tour. Their musical journey spans 30 countries, 400 performances, and countless stories. Much like the river they’re named after, their music flows freely across borders and genres, blending earthy Indian roots with global influences.
performer.name: The Tapi Project

description:
The show revisits their timeless contributions, blending history, performance,
and storytelling into one wholesome experience. Curated and written by Avanti
Patel, and directed by Mallika Singh and Meghana AT, the show is a heartfelt
ode to legendary performers such as Gauhar Jaan, Begum Akhtar, Iqbal Bano,
Shobha Gurtu and several women artists after them.
name: Windmills Music Night - O Gaanewali

performer.description: O Gaanewali is a unique musical celebration of the women who defined, popularised, and immortalised genres like Thumri, Dadra, Ghazal, Chaiti, Hori, and more. These women, known as gaanewalis, carried an unparalleled legacy of artistry and emotion, shaping Hindustani semi classical music history.
performer.name: O Gaanewali
